title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 686.5 - Waiver of rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 686.5 - Waiver of rule

State Regulations

Any public utility company may apply to this commission for
a waiver or modification of all or part of the requirements of this Part upon a
showing that compliance therewith would be impracticable or unduly burdensome
in connection with a particular project, contract or
agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
686.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
